about_the_game:
Ruby's Land - The Park Where Everything Changed

Once a place of joy and laughter, Ruby's Land is now a shadow of its past. A mysterious fire reduced the park to ashes, and with it, the director vanished without a trace. Today, no one knows what really happened… and those who venture too close never return.

Your Mission:

As a journalist, you are determined to uncover the truth behind this tragic event. Why has this park been left abandoned? What secrets does it still hide? And most importantly… what happened to the missing children?

A Journey into the Unknown:

  • Explore strange places: Traverse areas where every detail seems to tell a story.

  • Piece together the truth: Gather scattered clues, solve puzzles, and lift the veil on a forgotten mystery.

  • A heavy silence of threats: In Ruby's Land, what’s hidden can be more terrifying than what’s visible.

You are here for answers. But in Ruby's Land, some questions may be better left unanswered.

⚠️ This park didn’t just burn down… it changed.
